contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|upper}} '''Upper''' may refer to: * [[Shoe#Parts|Shoe upper or ''vamp'']], the part of a shoe on the top of the foot * [[Stimulant]], drugs which induce temporary improvements in either mental or physical function or both ==See also== {{lookfrom}} {{Disambiguation}} {{Short pages monitor}}<!-- This long comment was added to the page to prevent it from being listed on Special:Shortpages. It and the accompanying monitoring template were generated via Template:Long comment. Please do not remove the monitor template without removing the comment as well.-->
